post.body: Ohhhh! Failblog is funny more b/c ppl are stupid, not b/c ppl are suffering, though.
I guess. Booos clues, though. And wow, is the rain so bad in NY that your flight's so delayed?
But I didn't mean I didn't know what the world meant - I meant I didn't understand why you said it?
HAHAHAHA! I should tell Dave to send that to his students who ask stupid questions.
...What?
Also, FailBlog makes for great cheerings up :)!
I guess how I'll feel about how this interview went will depend on their decision. I always have such a bad read on these things.
Good luck!
Awww noes! What happened?
Dave says,"No, no, no, *you're* redic!" Also, isn't it totally legit - you have 14, and you didn't apply to nearly as many schools.
@ohfrabjousday Oh, Ben. You'll never live your "youthful indiscretions" down.
@ohfrabjousday And yet I remember it so clearly...
Congrats!
Keep it under control, you party animal.
Yea,they've had that for a bit - it's annoying: I dbl click on the page to make it scrollable & it gives me a search I don't want.
I used to kill mice. Had to crack open their skulls and cut up their brains. I just eat frogs, now. :)
Delusions of gang grandeur much?
Considering how much stuff I had to explain away, I'm impressed I got any answers out at all.
Unclear. I think it's probably wider at the "head" part than it is at the "neck" parts, but I need to see it in person.
Guess what I haven't received in the last two days?
@arif_lakhani @jumaro We're building a quorum :)!
...Lima bean?
I have one of 39.5. Totally need to up my A-game. Or... T-game?
@ohfrabjousday I've found that they have some good stuff - all depends on what you order, tho they're overpriced no matter what.
Do you mean Wagamama (not so much shabu shabu)? Or an even *newer* one? Obviously, I need to spend more time eating :).
True, but more convenient - hard to say which one, esp. in winter :). And no one's discovered it yet! No line on Sat PM!
Oh no! I hope he gets well soon!
I'm *trying* to be cheerful and optimistic - but it's super, super hard. Why don't they want me? ;_;
Not Josh Rouse, but Xmas music related: I hate that "Christmas Shoes" song - makes me cry the first time I hear it, every year.
im in your cuttlefish, telling it to kill!!!1!eleven! just kidding, :*
Please, may I have just one acceptance? One? Or maybe an interview invite?
OMGZ <3 <3 <3!
Also, sorry about not calling back yet - this weekend's been crazy - had to walk partway to work during the snow emergencies, boo.
You should restrict yourself to science writing, with technical definitions (eg. De novo melanomas vs. those from normal nevi...)
Superjealous - have fun! Also, is there an @blockies yet?
LOLs!
Lol, I misread that first as "Gasp! Beaver!" and I was like, "Awkward..." ;)
Can I have an acceptance to medical school for Christmas please?
Annoyed, now I think about it, I didn't get to talk about my interest in translational medicine, and how my oncology interest would relate.
And I got to see cadavers 2day! They were in bags, but I didn't freak out or *anything*! Esp. since it was my biggest fear when I was a kid.
Bleugh, just had my first interview. I can't quite tell how it went :/.
We were in the balcony, and the floor bounced as people danced! We must have hit a resonance frequency - I thought we were all going to die!
Vampire Weekend last night was *AMAZING*! But now I'm feeling nauseous - maybe the cheesecake and whipped cream leftovers went bad?
And now snow - awesome day!
Trimmed the *REAL* tree last night! It's so pretty, red and gold ornaments and lots of blinking lights - looks like a firefly infestation!
Right now, feeling 100% sure I won't get in :/.
Wish I had a place online to post my moods: past few months a constant seesaw b/w thinking I 100% won't get into med school and 80% I will.
Mock interview went well, I guess. Evidently (1) I suck at "tell me about yourself", and (2) I get really boring when I talk about research.
Watching the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show. It's...kind of awesome, really.
No schools love me. C'mon, it's the holidays!
Why no more interview invites?!?!?! ;_;
Short day, but annoying. I'm just sick of pipetting - I really, REALLY need to get into med school.
Things I'm in love with right now: gingerbread, Jackie O, Wilson's disease, smell of pine, House M.D., sons that take care of their moms.
Also, can anyone suggest a place to get soft, nice, cheap long-sleeved shirts and/or henleys? AA's expensive, I saw nothing at Macy's -help!
Hooded scarf: http://store.americanapparel.net/rsa0505.html. Opinions?
Headdesk. Repeat.
Last Tweet of the (work)day, since I'm going a little nuts here: Currently on the never-going-to-get-in side of the seesaw.
NO MORE SDN! It just drives me crazy! Oh, Max.... :(
Okay, Albert Einstein. Give me an invite! GIVE ME AN INVITE! Why don't you waaaaaannnnttt me?!?!
Med school apps make me hate myself. I wonder if it's intentional
Why do I get a cold *every* time I go home?!?!
Just me an my cuttlefish, taking over the world: http://xkcd.com/520/. Suck it, physicists.
Let me just say: I am sleepy, grumpy, angsty, anxious, crazy, and moody today. I hate Mondays.
Also, don't modify chocolate truffle recipes by adding more brandy - does not want. Does not want!
I hate my life.
Having a hard time getting a hold of myself here :/. Also: major snowstorm tmrw!
Been having lots of bad dreams recently: nuclear explosion, being chased through a house, a bank holdup last night. Weird.
So. happy! But. so. sad :(.
